mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.name, t1.business_key, t1.business_type, t1.longitude, t1.latitude, t1.tenant_id, t1.geom, ST_DISTANCE(ST_Transform(#{geoStr}::geometry, 26986), ST_Transform(t1.geom, 26986)) as distance FROM wos_gis t1 WHERE ST_DWithin(ST_Transform(t1.geom, 26986), ST_Transform(#{geoStr}::geometry, 26986), #{distance}) and t1.tenant_id = #{tenantId} order by distance asc;
